SEARCH
Package compiler.code

Interface ExprComponent

All Superinterfaces:
CodeComponent
All Known Implementing Classes:
AtomNode, ExprOpNode, MinusExprNode, ParenthesisExprNode
public interface ExprComponent extends CodeComponent
The ExprComponent interface represents an arithmetic expression component in the code. It extends the CodeComponent interface.
